Processing","plugin":{"name":"PySparkProgram","type":"sparkprogram","label":"Post Processing","artifact":{"name":"dynamic-spark","version":"2.2.3","scope":"USER"},"properties":{"pythonCode":"from pyspark import *
from pyspark.sql import *
from cdap.pyspark import SparkExecutionContext
import google.auth
from google.cloud import storage
import traceback
import re
import logging

sec = SparkExecutionContext()
sc = SparkContext()

# reading the required properties from runtime arguments
project_id = "${project-id}"
transformed_data_bucket_name = "${transformed-data-bucket}" if "gs://" not in "${transformed-data-bucket}" else "${transformed-data-bucket}".split("gs://")[1]
source = "${source}"
timestamp = "${timestamp}"
transformed_data_dir = source + "." + timestamp
target_files = "${transformed-files}"

storage_client = storage.Client()
transformed_data_bucket = storage_client.get_bucket(transformed_data_bucket_name)

def list_blobs_with_prefix(bucket_name, prefix, delimiter):
  blobs = storage_client.list_blobs(transformed_data_bucket_name, prefix=prefix, delimiter=delimiter)
  return blobs

def rename_target_file(file_name):
  file_prefix = transformed_data_dir + "/" + file_name + "/"
  blobs = list_blobs_with_prefix(transformed_data_bucket_name,file_prefix,'/')
  for blob in blobs:
    blob_name = blob.name
    if file_name in blob_name:
      blob_size = f"{blob.size} bytes"
    
      if blob_size == "0 bytes":
        blob.delete()
      else:
        pattern = "-r-\d{5}"
        result = re.findall(pattern, blob_name)
        if result:
          updated_blob_name = blob_name.split("/")[-1].replace("-r-", ".") + ".tab" #renaming file name
          updated_blob_path = "{}/{}".format(transformed_data_dir, updated_blob_name)
          transformed_data_bucket.rename_blob(blob, new_name=updated_blob_path)

def rename_all_target_files():
  print(f"--------------------List of Target Files: {target_files}--------------------")
  files = target_files.split(',')
  for file in files:
    print(f"--------------------Renaming Target File: {file}--------------------")
    rename_target_file(file)
  

try:
    print("<==================Post processing execution STARTED================================>")
    rename_all_target_files()
    print("<==================Post processing execution COMPLETED==============================>")
except:
    logging.info("Into Exception")
    exception_error_message = traceback.format_exc()
    logging.info(exception_error_message)"}},"outputSchema":"","id":"Post-Processing"}],"schedule":"0 1 */1 * *","engine":"spark","numOfRecordsPreview":100.0,"rangeRecordsPreview":{"min":1.0,"max":"5000"},"description":"PlanningCalendar","maxConcurrentRuns":1.0}
